message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Hello Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  I could come down to $18,000, but that's my absolute limit.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe I can find the product elsewhere for less. I am willing to pay up to $16,000 for it.
